name: Betrayal in Antara
notes:
Game works.
Possible crash at end of FMV cutscene (divide by zero error).  Pressing ESC before end of cutscene bypasses the error.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Betrayal in Antara/ANTARAR.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
